TextLang.Text: To perform this operation, you must quit [%1]. Do you want to quit the software now?
Enter the number you obtained from the Flickr website.
The information entered is not correct.
You cannot upload photos in the following formats with this network service:
Photos in supported formats will be uploaded.
Some or all of the photos could not be uploaded due to the upload limitations of this network service.
For details, refer to the help information on the website for this network service using a PC.
There are some photos that can be uploaded if you subscribe to this network service. For details, refer to the help information on the website for this network service using a PC.
If you do not have a Facebook account, sign up for an account at www.facebook.com using a PC.

You can share information on Facebook about items such as trophies you have earned and content you have purchased in PlayStation®Store. Go to [Facebook] under [PlayStation®Network] > [Account Management] to set these options.
When this option is selected, your Facebook privacy setting for this album will be set to [Everyone]. If you do not select this option, it will be set to [Only Friends].

The content will be available for viewing by the broadest range of people that can be set for this network service. To check details on how broadly the content will be able to be viewed or to change your settings, access the website for the network service using a PC.

When this option is selected, the content will be available for viewing by the broadest range of people that can be set for this network service. Even if this option is not selected, the content may be viewable by some people. To check details on how broadly the content will be able to be viewed or to change your settings, access the website for the network service using a PC.
The user name or password is not correct.
Your account information for [%1] will be deleted. Do you want to continue?
The maximum number of content items that can be created has been reached.
Do you want to cancel the upload operation?
